DOC.brief_summary: In the present study, it is planned to observe a population of 100 ED patients treated previously with udenafil and for whom their physician decided to switch them to sildenafil because of poor udenafil tolerance and/or poor efficacy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Evaluation Of Patients Opulation With Erectile Dysfunction, Treated With Sildenafil
DOC.criteria: Male patients aged â‰¥ 18 years. Clinical diagnosis of erectile dysfunction supported by a total score of less than or equal to 21 according to Sexual Health InventoryMale (SHIM). Patients having a sexual partner throughout the study. Patients having been switched to sildenafil after a previous treatment with udenafil proved ineffective and/or was poorly tolerated. The evaluation of udenafil ineffectivness should be performed after attempt intercourse 2 times a week over the course of four weeks. The patients for whom sildenafil is contraindicated according to the Local Product Document (LPD). (See appendix D) The patients for whom sexual activity is not indicated.
DOC.keyword: Erectile Dysfunction udenafil sildenafil treatment satisfaction
